text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    CodeDisplay
    B34.2Coronavirus infection, unspecified
    B97.2Coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
    B97.29Other coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
    U07.1COVID-19
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    186747009Coronavirus infection (disorder)
    713084008Pneumonia caused by Human coronavirus (disorder)
    840539006Disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
    840539006Disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)
